content.en: Renal cancer prediction: Researchers are using machine learning algorithms to predict the grade and characteristics of renal cell carcinomas. These algorithms analyze CT and MRI scans to differentiate between different types of renal cell carcinomas, predict the aggressiveness of tumors, and even determine the risk of death within 5 years for patients. By combining radiomics analysis with machine learning, scientists are developing models that can assist in the diagnosis and treatment of renal cell carcinoma.
content.da: Forudsigelse af nyrekræft: Forskere bruger maskinlæringsalgoritmer til at forudsige graden og egenskaberne af nyrecellekarcinomer. Disse algoritmer analyserer CT- og MRI-scanninger for at skelne mellem forskellige typer af nyrecellekarcinomer, forudsige tumorenes aggressivitet og endda bestemme risikoen for død inden for 5 år for patienter. Ved at kombinere radiomisk analyse med maskinlæring udvikler videnskabsmænd modeller, der kan bistå i diagnosen og behandlingen af nyrecellekarcinom.
